description: Particle type definitions with RPBL scores

particle_types.name: Entity
particle_types.description: Core domain object with identity and lifecycle management

particle_types.name: Repository
particle_types.description: Data access layer for aggregate persistence

particle_types.name: RepositoryImpl
particle_types.description: Concrete repository implementation (I/O boundary)

particle_types.name: Service
particle_types.description: Business logic coordination across domain objects

particle_types.name: UseCase
particle_types.description: Application-specific business operation with single purpose

particle_types.name: ValueObject
particle_types.description: Immutable object defined by its attributes, not identity

particle_types.name: DTO
particle_types.description: Data transfer object / schema (no business behavior)

particle_types.name: Controller
particle_types.description: Handles user input and coordinates application flow

particle_types.name: Factory
particle_types.description: Encapsulates complex object creation logic

particle_types.name: AggregateRoot
particle_types.description: Root entity that enforces business invariants

particle_types.name: DomainService
particle_types.description: Domain-specific business logic that doesn't fit in entities

particle_types.name: ApplicationService
particle_types.description: Application-level orchestration and coordination

particle_types.name: Specification
particle_types.description: Encapsulated business rule that can be combined

particle_types.name: EventHandler
particle_types.description: Handles domain events and executes side effects

particle_types.name: Projection
particle_types.description: Read model optimized for queries

particle_types.name: ReadModel
particle_types.description: Denormalized view model for read operations

particle_types.name: Command
particle_types.description: Immutable intent to change system state

particle_types.name: Query
particle_types.description: Immutable request for system information

particle_types.name: Policy
particle_types.description: Encapsulated business rule or algorithm

particle_types.name: Strategy
particle_types.description: Pluggable algorithm implementation

particle_types.name: Observer
particle_types.description: Reactive pattern for state change notifications

particle_types.name: Mediator
particle_types.description: Central coordinator for component communication

rpbl_explanation.responsibility: Weight and importance of the particle's responsibilities (1-10)
rpbl_explanation.purity: Functional purity and immutability of the particle (1-10)
rpbl_explanation.boundary: Boundary control and interface definition strength (1-10)
